375 degrees Fahrenheit for 45 minutes to
an hour until
deeply browned and soft and a paring

squash without resistance or objection
pat yourself on the back for total
nailing that squash and now it's time to

while it's this hot then I'm going to
add about 4 ounces of grated Parmesan

and then set aside to cool and then it's
very much the same procedures before up
until we get to the thin sheet of pasta

we're going to play some small dollops

going to wet the area around each dollop
of filling with our wet finger and then
we're folding the top half of the pasta
over the bottom half of the pasta and
trying to coax out any trapped air we're
going to press around each piece of
